title: Calling it Now: Jhin is Demacian

embed.description: The Virtuoso Jhin's assembling his gun and orchestrating his grand entrance onto the Rift. He's meticulous and calculating - League's slowest marksman yet. But when the murderous artist gets you in his sights, when he catches you off-guard, there's not much that'll save you from an inevitable, perfect death.

body:
EDIT: Welp. I was wrong. For those of you who have not heard, Jhin is confirmed as a Ionian criminal, who was broken out of jail by shadowy elements in their high council. Thanks for commenting. I'm glad I managed to convince a lot of you with my assorted evidences that he was Demacian!


Full Disclosure: I am not the first one post this idea. I did, however, come up with it independently. I'll try to link in as many other threads as I find.

     The first Demacian connection I saw was Jhin's color scheme in the leaked splash. White and gold are the traditional Demacian colors, and he is practically festooned in them.

     After that, I got to thinking. There has not been a new champion from either Noxus or Demacia for quite a while (Lucian was the last, and he is not very strongly associated with Demacia). That can moderately affect his providence, especially if you consider the recent expansions in the Pilovian and Zuanite champion pools. As par of that, Demacia's characters are all very much the same on live: Goody-goodies with a fairly similar views on honor, justice, and all that. In contrast, their enemy Noxians have proven to have quite a variety of morals, from the sinister Black Rose, to the loyal Du Couteaus, and the idealistic Riven. A 'evil' Demacian would make sense from Riot's perspective, as he would be a unique character.

     However, the most interesting, and solid piece of evidence in favor of Jhin being Demacian comes from his recent champion reveal. At the very end of the detonation of Jhin's E (Captive Audience), a flower symbol appears. However, I do not think that is just _any_ flower. Observe the following:
http://imgur.com/gallery/1KaUBPr/new
http://tinyurl.com/JhinTheory1
The similarity was striking to me. Perhaps Jhin is Fiora's disgraced father? The crazy uncle they never talk about? To say anything at this point is pure speculation, of course.


**Credit Where Credit is Due**
Here is all the other threads which support this theory:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/jqEY7aM2-the-jhin-connection-people-seem-to-ignore
This thread compares the art of Jhin and Lucian and suggests that they might both be connected to Demacian purifiers.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/U0L5FZj8-jhin-related-to-fiora-look-here
Someone else drew the Laurent connection by comparing Fiora's Splash with Jhin's release art.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/Eu915WsB-jhin-outfit-reminds-me-a-bit-of-fioras
Another Laurent connection. This time, it is the outfits are compared.

Tell me if you find more! Happy hunting!

-Nixtarma

replies.body:
Jhin is more than likely Ionian. The background in the reveal is Ionia, only darker.

Original: http://i.imgur.com/vsb2Ub4.jpg>

In reveal: http://i.imgur.com/TY88Ute.jpg>

Welp turns out you were right;)

I wonder if Riot will do(or maybe has already done?)similar things in the future.
Bump, I didn't see that I just assumed Ionian because of how his thematic seemed to work.

O_O

How did you ever notice that? Thanks for pointing it out!

> [{quoted}](name=Nixtarma,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I6IAMOMx,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-01-13T02:20:09.118+0000)
>
> O_O
> 
> How did you ever notice that? Thanks for pointing it out!

I had the (original) Ionia image for my wallpaper for a while, so I was easily able to recognize the big arches on the side.

or
or
or
or

PART OF THE BLACK ROSE
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1439488942/The_Black_Rose.jpg

Oooo.

I'd take it.

Have you seen his face?

No.

I will tell you why:

He is a yordle.

A tall yordle... like... REALLY tall.

That is why he uses a mask, he is hiding his yordle face.

So, he is from Bandle City, 100% confirmed.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I6IAMOMx,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-01-13T04:33:36.260+0000)
>
> Have you seen his face?
> 
> No.
> 
> I will tell you why:
> 
> He is a yordle.
> 
> A tall yordle... like... REALLY tall.

Just like Corki

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8JsV6bMGy8k&index=13&list=PLn4G5-LpUhtPfVpfQyGQDsQSLakpkHbgT
Most league players have this habit of grouping every midget champion a yordle, whether or not they're one.
I'm with Ebonmaw.

Ostracised demacian, I tell ya!

I'm assuming in Demacia appearences are very important. Family name is also very important. Maybe he was a different kid from the start, maybe he was pressured too much to live up to certain standarts and his needs were neglected.

Dunno but the theme is there, being beautiful, being perfect.

Also, I called in the other thread that he's Fioras long-lost-never-mentioned brother. Maybe a family secret, she doesn't even know about him, dun dun dun.
he's not demacian, a riot member comment a while back saying no demacian or noxian champs are in the work and probably won't be till the end of this year

Given that he has a robotic limb, a high tech gun, and isn't dressed like a mad scientist or a street punk, I'm going with him being from Piltover.Just compare his clothes to Jayce's and you'll see what I mean.

There is one big problem that I have with him coming from demacia:
Have you ever seen a cyborg demacian?Or a demacian who uses anything technological advanced?
No,even Lucians guns are made of magical stone

Also the flower picture doesn't quite add up,if he really was connected to Fiora then I'd assume that he gets the symbol right.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I6IAMOMx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-12T23:27:24.356+0000)
>
> There is one big problem that I have with him coming from demacia:
> Have you ever seen a cyborg demacian?Or a demacian who uses anything technological advanced?
> No,even Lucians guns are made of magical stone
> 
> Also the flower picture doesn't quite add up,if he really was connected to Fiora then I'd assume that he gets the symbol right.

I meant to address this in your reply to my post in another Jihn thread. It's plausible that Jihn attempted to follow the same path Foria did in restoring honor to his name and family, and failed miserably at it and becoming horrible injured as a consequence, therefore his name and house was exiled as punishment. He could have gone independent, and possibly had contacts in other global cities such as Zaun and Piltover, where he began his plan to make things beautiful and picked up everything he needed from these locations.

Also, to call oneself 'The Virtuoso' screams Demacian arrogance.

> [{quoted}](name=Furor Nexis,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=I6IAMOMx,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-01-13T00:05:36.286+0000)
>
> Also, to call oneself 'The Virtuoso' screams Demacian arrogance.

But Piltover is also seen as rather arrogant and they have the technology for his equipment.
I think the flower looks like a black rose :0.
What if they want us to think that and he's actually from **BLACK ROSE**?
So I think Fiora and Jhin are friends or allies? I think so...
